findings.title: Similar LP Token Address can be added more than once
findings.description: The add() function at Line 147 allows storing a similar LP Token Address more than once, which will lead to an unexpected scenario where different pools will have a similar LP token address.

findings.title: Violation of Check_Effects_Interaction Pattern in the Withdraw function
findings.description: The withdraw function makes 2 external calls within the function. The first external call is made to the reward token contract, however, the user state is updated after the external call. The second external call is made to the lpToken but the Withdrawn event is emitted after this external call.

findings.title: updatePool and massUpdatePools functions have been assigned a Public visibility
findings.description: The updatePool and massUpdatePools functions have been assigned a public visibility instead of internal, making them accessible to everyone.
